## Business Analytics Professional

I'm a passionate analytics professional pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. With a background in Computer Science and experience as a Business Analyst, I bridge technology and analytics to solve complex business challenges.

My expertise spans data analysis, statistical modeling, and business intelligence, strengthened by skills in Python, R, SQL, and visualization tools like Tableau and Power BI.
